授業目的:
-The purpose of this course to help students improve their overall English reading skills.
-Students will improve their comprehension (ability to understand) of different English texts - learning and practicing different reading skills, such as skimming, scanning, and predicting.
-Students will also learn to summarize English texts.
-Students will learn about the parts and organization of English texts.
-Readings will be about a variety of interesting topics.
-There will be a focus on improving vocabulary. Students will learn important new words and phrases needed to understand readings.
到達目標:
• Students will improve their overall ability to read and understand English texts.
Learning Goals will include a focus on the 5Cs - Communication / Collaboration / Creativity / Critical Thinking / Carrying Ownership
• Students will improve their oral reading skills (reading out loud). This will include improving reading fluency, pronunciation, intonation and stress, and rhythm.
• Students will improve their comprehension (ability to understand) of English texts.
• Students will learn about and use different reading skills. Some of these include skimming, scanning, making inferences, predicting, and summarizing.
• Students will improve their vocabulary knowledge. Key words and phrases will be learned to help with comprehension.
• Students will do extensive reading.
